original_text: You should not only please God, but you should be kind to other believers. You should not only love other believers, but you must also love all people.
korean_text: 경건에 형제 우애를, 형제 우애에 사랑을 더하라

sentences.original_text: You should not only please God
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 하나님만 기쁘시게 해서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: but you should be kind to other believers
You should not only love other believers
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 다른 신자들만 사랑해서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: but you must also love all people
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 모든 사람을 또한 사랑해야 한다
